newsitem.title: USA: U.S. mortgage application volume rose in latest wk.
newsitem.headline: U.S. mortgage application volume rose in latest wk.

text.p: The volume of U.S. mortgage applications rose 48.3 percent in the week ended January 16, according to a Mortgage Bankers Association of America weekly survey.
Specifically, the volume of applications to refinance mortgages rose 43.6 percent in the latest survey week, while applications to purchase mortgages rose 50.3 percent.
The seasonally adjusted refinancing index fell 13.8 percent to 323.6 from 375.5 the previous week.
The purchase index fell 13.8 percent to 178.3 in the latest survey from 206.9 in the previous week.
